text: Pavol Steiner (29 March 1908 in Bratislava – 4 June 1969 in Martin, Žilina) was a Czechoslovak/Slovak water polo player who competed in the 1928 Summer Olympics. In 1928 he was part of the Czechoslovak team in the Olympic tournament. He played the only match. ==References== *sports-reference Category:1908 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Czechoslovak male water polo players Category:Slovak male water polo players Category:Water polo players at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic water polo players of Czechoslovakia Category:Sportspeople from Bratislava
title: Pavol Steiner
